content.description: Water is moving sequentially through two circular horizontal pipes, <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, respectively. The radius of Pipe <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is <math alttext="r sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the radius of Pipe <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is <math alttext="2 , r sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. The speed of the water in pipes <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is <math alttext="v sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, respectively.
content.question: Which of the following correctly represents <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 2 , and denominator v sub 1 ." overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math> ?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
